name: Pumpkin Poe
description:
This game came out the day before Halloween 2017 and is developed by Ariel Endaraues, powered with AGD by Jonathan Cauldwell, and the music is composed by David Saphier.

Its a Platform game in the style of classics such as Dynamite Dan or Jet Set Willy.

You play as Pumpkin Poe who was transformed into a scarecrow many years ago and each Halloween comes alive trying to find 16 hidden candies. If you find all the candies and a black cat you will have completed the quest and the magician Nallib is awaiting in his tower to help you break the spell and change you back to your human form.
